name: Air combat soundtrack
detailed_description:
All music of Air Combat series is included.(mp3)
The folder name is "Soundtrack"

You can find this folder by right-clicking on the game name from the STEAM application and pressing Properties, Local Files tab, View Local Files.

1:"AntiAir" from Massive Air Combat
2:"Beginning" from Massive Air Combat
3:"Centurion" from Air Combat (Version 2.00)
4:"ClearTheSky" from Massive Air Combat
5:"FindTheEnemy" from Massive Air Combat
6:"FoxHunting" from Massive Air Combat
7:"Massive Air Combat" from Massive Air Combat
8:"Maxell" from SkyGameChanger-Air Combat II-
9:"Menu" from Massive Air Combat
10:"SavetheAirliner" from Air Combat(Version 1.00)
11:"SkyFortress" from SkyGameChanger-Air Combat II-
12:"Start!" from Air Combat (Version 2.00)
13:"XF-98" from SkyGameChanger-Air Combat II-
